DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this protocol is to assess the efficacy of two dose strengths of varenicline (0.5 mg BID and 1mg BID) as adjunctive treatment for cognitive impairment in symptomatically stable outpatient schizophrenic subjects who are receiving treatment with atypical antipsychotic medications. A secondary objective is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of two doses of varenicline in symptomatically stable schizophrenic subjects who are receiving treatment with atypical antipsychotic medications.
DOC.brief_title: A 6-Week Multicenter Trial Of Varenicline Tartrate For Cognitive Impairment In Subjects With Schizophrenia
